originalText.text: I want to give a huge shout out to Dan and James for everything they did for my mom. The day started with a question and ended with an answer. You’ll always question a lawsuit but don’t feel guilty for doing it. We did, and after a conversation our minds were settled with ease. My mom was 84 at the time and he walked her through everything and was right next to her through all depositions. This law firm is extremely professional and has the BEST attorneys around. Please if you have doubts give them a call. Thank you Dan for everything from the bottom of our hearts!

originalText.text: Where do I begin?! My mom ran into a little bit of a pickle where someone slipped and fell in front of her building and was being sued, my mom who is retired had no idea where to begin looking for a lawyer, my first instinct was to reach out to 1800lawyers. Needless to say I spoke to about 30 lawyers, but one out of the 30 , one stood out and that was Leigh Sutton, while speaking to him he really did put our minds at ease, he was upfront and honest about the entire process. After speaking with him I told my mom that’s the lawyer you will retain. I’m extremely happy to say that the case was settled in my mom’s favor. There isn’t enough praise and thanks that we can give to Leigh and his law firm. Thank you all so much for your dedication and diligence. I would definitely recommend retaining them to represent you if you’re ever in the market for a lawyer.

originalText.text:
I was extremely happy with how they handled my case. Dan Smyth communicated with me throughout the process. The case settled in under a year, and I was very happy with the amount. I would highly recommend Sutton & Smyth, LLP.
He also has a great sense of humor which makes a bad situation feel less awful!

originalText.text: Very knowledgeable.  I worked with them on an insurance matter. Very favorable outcome. They kept me apprised along the way of all actions on my case. I would 100% recommend anyone to use them. They provided excellent service and always responded timely.

originalText.text: I highly recommend this company. Daniel Smyth is an amazing attorney… very passionate with his work, understanding, attentive and hard working. Thank you so much for working with me and my case, I am truly satisfied.
